entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lack of ahead-of-time HttpConnectionPool warming leads to very long latencies on cold starts #93156
  • AV in LibraryImport tests #93155
  • Enable EVEX embedded rounding support in xarch emitter #93154
    9.0.0
  • Update ComInterfaceGenerator to use collection expressions in IID creation #93151
    9.0.0
  • Hot reload - EnC: we do not support patching of existing PARAM table cols. token=0x08000d0e #93149
  • Unable to publish to Alpine image, executable not found or runtime identifier 'linux-musl-x64' not supported #93146
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 9) #93144
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Implement induction variable analysis #93143
    9.0.0
  • Implement loop peeling #93142
    9.0.0
  • CodeGen infrastructure work planned for .NET 9 #93141
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Enable replay filter by attribute or metric #93140
    Future
  • Enable post back of JIT test pipeline results to triggering GitHub PR #93138
    9.0.0
  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs pipeline parallelism #93137
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] runtime tests timing out on `Build Tests` step for rolling builds #93134
  • [wasm] Specifying relative path for `resources` in runtime config not working #93133
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator emits SYSLIB1100 when it shouldn't apply #93132
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder polymorphism on bind - does not support binding to derived members #93130
    9.0.0
  • Profiling is not working on Alpine on 8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8 #93122
  • `JsonObjectCreationHandling.Populate` handles init-only properties inconsistently in reflection/source gen #93114
    8.0.0
  • STJ source generator fails due to 260 character path length limit on Windows (with EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles=true) #93111
  • [mono][tests] System.Runtime.Caching assert fails on linux-bionic #93106
  • JIT struct work planned for .NET 9 #93105
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] The type initializer for 'NetSecurityNative' threw an exception #93104
  • [mono][tests] IntrinsicsInSystemPrivateCoreLib reports hostname is not provided on linux bionic #93103
    9.0.0
  • [WinHttpHandler] Assertion in AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #93099
    9.0.0
  • MetricEventSource value published events don't resolve which scope they are refering to #93097
    9.0.0
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 9.0 #93095
    9.0.0
  • Environment.GetfolderPath( Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal ) not returning FolderPath in .net 8.0 rc1 #93094

Closed

  • Arm64: Evaluate if it is possible to combine subsequent field loads in a single load #64815
    9.0.0
  • Assembly.Location for System.Net.Sockets.dll is sometimes corrupted on .NET 8 RC1 #93127
  • JIT: Consider reordering loads on ARM64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92756
    Future
  • [8.0] [wasm] WorkloadNotRequiredForInvariantGlobalization timeout waiting for web server url #91143
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.DownloadResourceProgressTests.DownloadProgressFinishes - failed to bind to address http://127.0.0.1:5000 - already in use #92295
    9.0.0
  • `HostApplicationBuilder` does not update configuration file path. #93145
  • superpmi: add libraries test run collection #79017
    9.0.0
  • JIT Testing Strategies for .NET 7 #64832
    Future
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator: The given line is '63' characters long, which is fewer than the provided character number '65' #93128
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AppendFormat<TValue>(ReadOnlySpan<char> format, ReadOnlySpan<char> strArg = default, params TValue[] args) where TValue: INumber<TValue>(); #93091
  • JIT/SIMD/CircleInConvex_[r]/[ro] are failing on arm64 Mono interpreter #92925
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator throws on an abstract member rather than binding to existing value #92137
    8.0.0
  • ServerClosesConnection_ThrowsHttpProtocolException test failed with wrong exception type #92359
    9.0.0
  • InMemoryDirectoryInfo constructor not recognizing root #93107
  • JsonStringEnumConverter ignores 'allowIntegerValues' when deserializing quoted numeric values #58247
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a library for working with pictures #93075
  • Test failure profiler\\rejit\\rejit\\rejit.cmd #71316
    9.0.0
  • ilasm roundtrip testing should ensure roundtripped assembly file name matches baked-in assembly name #71119
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use our now-split MarshalAs parsing to simplify our "forwarder with marshalling attributes" logic #93157
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Remove coree/mixed-mode support #93153
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock jump target private #93152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93150
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93148
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93147
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Use Sync Send methods in Sync HttpClient tests #93139
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [HTTP/SSL] Fix stress #93135
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Use C11 _Noreturn (or [[noreturn]]) instead of GCC attribute #93131
    area-Build-mono
  • Update APICompat suppression files to ignore TFMs #93129
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing PACKAGE.md #93123
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • ECMA335 NaN encoding test fix #93121
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Handle binding to initialized abstract members #93120
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Optimize Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase_Vector with AVX2 and AVX512 #93116
    area-System.Runtime
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • Speed up calling interface methods #93100
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Avoid membarrier on lower Android versions #93096
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Use standard NaNs in FP ops for cross-compiling RISC-V on x86 #93098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable branch optimizations when using LLVM. #93092
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace confusing `new T[] { ... }` optimization with collection expressions #93125
    area-Meta
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Tanh/Cosh/Sinh #93093
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][tests] Disable MemoryStream_SeekOverflow_Throws on apple mobile platforms #93110
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][android] Fix android extra-platforms by renaming the project name #93109
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • CBOR Writer: Use canonical NaN representation for NaN values #92934
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Replace some stackallocs with collection expressions #93126
    area-Meta
  • Fix "warning : Reference to undeclared extern assembly 'mscorlib'" in tst.il #93101
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #93006
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Resolve x64 libc++ being included with linux-arm64 to browser-wasm cross-compiler #93070
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [PERF] Update release/8.0-rc1 to release/8.0 in perf.yml #93136
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-installer, area-codeflow
  • Fix passing CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE in runtime tests using Ninja #93051
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update release/8.0-rc1 to release/8.0 in perf.yml #93087
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Allow experimenting with different CSE subsets #92918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert AllConfigurations and NETFX jobs to use the global build templates #93082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Avoid per-NumberFormatInfo default array allocations #93117
    area-System.Globalization
  • Avoid large array allocation in UmAlQuraCalendar.InitDateMapping #93118
    area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][tests] Disable failing library tests on linux-bionic #93108
    os-linux, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix calling of static delegates with simd arguments #92927
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Android][build] Fix android package name containing `-` #93077
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][hotreload] Generate seq_points if we don't have pdb information from HotReload #93039
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Handle binding to initialized abstract members #93090
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add catch for ConnectionAborted in Http3 #93049
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove duplicated stores #93084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • `readonly`-ify fields based on whole program view #92923
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndReplicateToVector64x* and LoadAndReplicateToVector128x* APIs #92909
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move internal BitOperations.LeadingZeroCount({U}Int128) #93068
    area-System.Numerics
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbPrev and bbNext private #93032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sigmoid and TensorPrimitives.SoftMax #93029
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93088
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Second try at using C11 atomics #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException server to Loopback #93025
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Try rooting less stuff for reflectable method signatures #92994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update JIT debug helpers #93086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable intrinsics support for multiplication and division for Vector2/4 by scalar + refactor #93061
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Merge .net format repo into SDK or roslyn repos #35915
    9.0.1xx
  • Cannot update workload manifests from authenticated AzDO feeds on macOS #35912
  • PublishCompressionFormats is not used during dotnet pack #35889

Closed

  • dotnet nuget push fails when pushing a relatively large package (3.4MB) to Github #35888
  • 'dotnet pack' produces invalid nuget package when property 'PackagePath' contains a backslash #35908
  • Investigate APICompat errors caused by assembly references re-used from the right-hand side during package validation #35214
    8.0.1xx
  • `dotnet publish --no-build` no longer working with `net8.0-macos` target framework #35705

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update GivenThatWeWantToPublishAFrameworkDependentApp.cs to fix chars… #35891
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Declare dependencies for two Extensions.Logging packages #35906
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix concurrent tool restore and version range error #35884
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Tools
  • APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35489
    Area-ApiCompat, 9.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2284955 #35887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • SDK resolver perf: Don't check current process for dotnet.exe on .NET Framework #35890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35835
    untriaged
  • Pass failure message reported from from getApplyUpdateCapabilities in WASM to dotnet watch #35755
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35851
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • (for discussion only) Add support for `DOTNET_WATCH_AUTO_RELOAD_WS_ENDPOINT` to `dotnet watch` #31575
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Spec LDM decision that collection expressions targeting IEnumerable<T> implement nongeneric IList #7577

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We shuld have good documentation links for installing VS build tools or Mono #70281
  • Visual Studio reports warnings in auto-generated tagged files #70280
  • IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) is incorrectly suppressed if a nameof expression is used anywhere in the body. #70276
  • Deprecate syntax serialization logic. #70275
  • Cannot build deeply nested hierarchies with .NET 8 RC 1 SDK (e.g. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Odata) #70272
  • `SemanticModel.GetAliasInfo` returns null when non named types are aliased #70269
  • Incorrectly correcting a lambda expression, changing the behaviour of a delegate #70268
  • Unexpected System.ArrayTypeMismatchException at execution time #70267

Closed

  • AddParameterCheck/InitializeMemberFromParameter refactorings should be resilient to the presence of IOperation nodes for compiler generated MyBase.New call #70004
    17.9
  • Include implicit `MyBase.New()` calls in VB Constructors #64354
    17.9
  • Cannot build deeply nested hierarchies with .NET 8 RC 1 SDK (e.g. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Odata) #70254
  • Run Code Analysis command does not report any violations when LSP pull diagnostics is enabled #65967
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add empty file local class #70282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid taking a lock the vast majority of the time in GlobalOptionService.GetOption #70278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP - Remove IObjectWritable #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP - Demonstrate removing syntax reading/writing from streams. #70274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.8] Collection expressions: merge changes for conversions and optimizations #70273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unskip working tests #70266
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update VS version used for signed builds #70271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify writing to asset buffer #70279
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix VB features impacted by IOperation change #70191
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: empty Span optimization #70260
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged, Next
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge stragglers from collection expressions into `main` branch #70265
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for using Mono to load .NET Framework projects #70263
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose fix all for refactorings as an experimental public API #69430
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, 17.8
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51191
  • Unable to configure Data Protection via IOptionsMonitor<DataProtectionOptions> #51190
  • Android java client - RuntimeException: Invocation provides 1 argument(s) but target expects 0. #51189
  • Release the ReportViewer source code under a permissive license #51187
  • SignalR TS HttpConnection._resolveUrl fails if URL starts with "ws+unix:" (area-signalr) #51185
  • RequestDelegateGenerator creates incorrect code with default parameters for bool and CancellationToken in Lambda expressions (AOT) #51183
  • Blazor g11n/i18n support #51181
  • Logout fails in Blazor Web App with Identity #51180
  • User isn't logged in after registering a new user in a Blazor Web App with Identity #51179
  • Applying migrations using db error page fails for Blazor Web App with Identity #51178
  • The DailyBuilds page does not contain any links to Linux installers #51176

Closed

  • Compression under HTTPS with `dotnet watch` and `launchBrowser: true` breaks some HTML responses #32767
    .NET 8 Planning
  • hotReload fails with exception "Could not load type 'AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument" #44361
  • Net7 Blazor webassembly does not work with dotnet watch #45074
  • VS 2022 17.4.3 throw a exception at startup: The startup hook simple assembly name 'Watch.BrowserRefresh.dll' is invalid #45610
  • dotnet watch epic fail on Ubuntu #47122
  • dotnet watch - force use "Ctrl+R" to restart after static class change #48618
  • dotnet watch run with args break hot reload #51171
    8.0-rc2
  • Hot reload doesn't work with the empty Blazor Web App template #50931
    8.0.0
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #51182
  • Swap the order of the http/https launch profiles? #51159
  • Blazor Web App: AuthorizeRouteView NotAuthorized #51164
  • [Blazor] The default reconnect display does not appear after an enhanced navigation occurs #51083
    8.0.0
  • RazorComponentResult gives error: Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #51174
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51172

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `2dd1c13` #51186
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove MapIdentityApi's InfoResponse.Claims property #51177
    Servicing-consider, area-identity

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix default reconnect display not showing after enhanced navigation #51173
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Change Interactivity option text in Blazor web template #51160
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0.0
  • Rename "ASP.NET Core Web App" to "ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages)" #51157
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `dotnet dump analyze` commands like `pe` crashes the debugging session #2315
    Future
  • How can I install dotnet tools on runtime only pod? #4140
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace logging for logging abstractions in netcore.client library #4296

Updated

  • Add RequestStackwalk parameter to EventPipeSession #4290
  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification - Automated `Collect` Testing #4253

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on release build on Android (App ported from Xamarin) when App.xaml contains GridLength #17879
  • TabbedPage does not trigger when reselected current tab #17877
  • Cannot see unicode characters in the title of mini window #17876
  • MAUI ContentPresenter issue when child view uses a embedded ResourceDictionary #17875
  • How to update label inside Shell.FlyoutHeaderTemplate in MAUI .net 7.0 #17873
  • [ANDROID] Font Asset Not Found: java.lang.RuntimeException - OpenSansSemibold #17872
  • App crash with PlatformView cannot be null here #17871
  • [Windows] Content of `Grid` placed inside `ScrollView` is partially visible #17870
  • [Windows] `Grid` layout does not resize correctly #17869
  • [Android] `ImageButton` causes app unresponsiveness #17868
  • Android keyboard native enter / accept / ok button is not submitting values. #17867
  • The `ScrollTo` method from the `CollectionView` class does not reveal groups #17866
  • [Windows] `CollectionView` throws NRE when `ScrollTo` method is called from a handler of event `Window.Created` #17865
  • [Windows] `CollectionView` throws NRE when value of `IsGrouped` property is changed to `false` #17864
  • Android Crashing: "Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to draw too large(109224768bytes) bitmap.'" Runs perfect on iOS/Windows. Any ideas why? #17862
  • Adding a Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged handler throw an exception on Android 14 #17861
  • Maui Preferences always thows exception while using datatype other than string. #17858
  • Image.Source = ImageSource.FromResource() & ImageSource.FromStream() are not reliably integrating back with the MainThread? Causing app breaking threading error? (Android issue only, okay in iOS and Windows) #17857
  • CollectionView still has default spacing between items, despite numerous PRs to fix it #17851

Closed

  • Label with multibinding is not visible in collectionView #17859
  • Only first item in CollectionView is visible if ItemTemplate have multibinding #17856
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] Grid with padding column misalignment #16815
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI Custom Entry on Android, background drawable #17860
    .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Insert trigger breaks SaveChanges #31985
  • ExecuteUpdate Produce Wrong Query when used with window function and join #31984
  • Is a value comparer really required for record types? #31983

Closed

  • Support value converters with captured state in the compiled model #31859
    8.0.0
  • [QUESTION] Switch entity type for a record in TPH keeping same keys #31966
  • Mapping the two unrelated entity types to the same table should generate a better warning. #31703
    Backlog
  • Adding Multiple Related Entities With Explicit Join Entity Causes FK Violation #30128
    8.0.0
  • Many to many entity add faild #29882
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Unwrap closures when translating expression trees for compiled model. #31981
    Servicing-approved
  • Remove quirks from main #31976

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Synthesize concurrency tokens for derived tables in TPC and TPT #31979
    Servicing-approved
